p.e:
The R28 Railgun Revolver
is operated like any normal
revolver with the difference
that only 8% of it's energy
actually come from the tiny
ammount of propellant inside
the casings. To eject the
empty casings tap the end
of the cylinder facing away
from you after opening it by
taping the end that IS facing
you. Darts are loaded from the
back. The mounting rail of the
front sight doubles as a laser
sight when touched and the
blue switch toggles semi/full
auto. It also penetrates walls.

p.e:
Althrough being called "Bazooka"
by some {while being even less
similar to the actual Bazooka
than the Panzerschreck} the
RPG-7 is THE most iconic
anti-tank rocket launcher of all
time. Take a camera and film an
action-movie right now!

p.e:
Like the WPE the P3 does
what it says on the tin and
similarities don't end here.
It is a pistol {last P}
wich fires five {first P for penta}
energy-pellets {center P}
with each of the five charges it
holds. they are offset by an
angle of 1 degree to each other
rangeing from -2 to +2 degrees
azimut. the pellets speed up over
time but need to be reloaded
manually by tapping the bottom of
the grip or tilting the entire device
to the left.

p.e:
The wide pulse emitter
does what it says on
the tin. It's horizontally
expanding shockwaves
subside after about 20m
and are stopped by the
first surface it comes in
contact with. It has to
recharge after every shot
wich it does quickly and
automaticly.

p.e:
Tube-magazine fed
grenadelauncher of
the russian special
forces. open the lid
on the top, stuff
nades in, push and
pull the shaft {don't
pull and push like a
pumpgun} put one
more grenade in since
you chambered one and
close the lid so you can
see the sights.
Instructions on using
them wouldn't fit this
screen.

p.e:
The last gun to need an
introduction for anyone.
just squeeze the trigger
untill the thing stops going
[INSERT 2017 MEME].
Then pull {or smack} out
the Magazine, clip a new one
in and repeat.
This one even has iluminated
sights you probably don't 
even care about.

p.e:
Based on a modified MG40
this machinegun features
a high firerate as well
as the tendency to
overheat.
You can replace the
barrel with the lever
on the right.
In case you arn't Rambo
you won't hit the wide
side of a barn trying to
shoot it one-handed
